Jake got into the car with his older brother after soccer practice. Jake's older brother, Sam, was 18 years old and very muscular. Sam was nice, and Jake looked up to him, hoping to one day be as big and strong as him.

"Hey little bro! How was practice?" Sam asked.

"It was good." Jake said, but he was really focused on what they were going to do next. Sam was going to the gym and taking Jake with him. Jake was going to get to see his brother work out!

Sam and Jake drove five minutes down the street from the soccer field to the local gym. They got out of the car and Sam went straight in to start working out, Jake right behind him. Sam went over to the bench press, as his arms were his favorite to work out with.

Sam began to put weights on the metal bar as Jake looked around at the muscular men trying to get as big as possible. Jake pictured himself as big as the men there, and he thought that maybe he could start working out too.

His brother calling his name snapped Jake out of his daydream. "What is it Sam?" Jake asked.

"I'm running out of weights, could you go find me a 10 lb.?" Sam asked.

Jake nodded and stood up, scanning the room for the right weight. Finally, he spotted what appeared to be a 10 lb. weight across the room, and without another thought, he went over and picked it up, looking at the huge men as he walked back to Sam.

Jake reached out to hand the weight to his brother. "Thanks Jake!" Sam said, reaching out to grab the weight and put it on the rack.

However, when Sam grabbed the weight from his brother, the weight plummeted right to the ground, as Sam couldn't hold on to it. "What the heck?" Sam asked to no one in particular as he bent over to inspect the weight. Suddenly, Sam had a questioning look on his face as he turned towards Jake.

Jake shrugged in astonishment. He had carried the weight without another thought! Sam and Jake couldn't think of a proper way to explain the strange incident.

“Go to the treadmills or the stationary bikes or something! Go burn off that unused energy you haven’t used up during soccer!” Sam responded with a deep sigh. Sam had to think of something to keep his little brother occupied for at least another thirty minutes so that he could work out in peace.

“Alright… Thanks bro!” Jake said, as he turned around and casually strolled past all the big muscle guys who were so busy lifting weights.

Jake walked to the treadmills, which were located neatly by the water fountain upstairs in the nice, newly constructed gym. Jake walked up the stairs and looked around, gawking at all the awesome workout equipment everywhere. There were also lots of rooms behind these tall, white walls, so he couldn't see everything that was there. Strangely enough, when Jake stared at a piece of wall long enough, the wall became transparent, and it seemed as if he was able to look straight THROUGH the walls, just by concentrating slightly! He saw the aerobic classes and the racquetball courts, and he was amazed by all the things that were offered in the vast recreational facility!

When Jake finally found a treadmill which was unused, he stepped on the conveyor belt and held on to the handle bars which were located right in front of him. He entered a simple beginner's running program on the display panel in front of him, and he started his walk.

"Oh this can't be too hard!" Jake grinned, as he just started walking for a few minutes while following the directions on the screen.

After a few moments, the preteen boy got bored and decided to increase the speed a little. The display indicated his walking speed, which was steady at 3 MPH, and indicated the distance covered as well.

"Let's go faster!" Jake grinned.

Jake started a slow jog, and he noticed that the belt on the treadmill started rolling faster under his soccer shoes.

The machine under the treadmill hummed at a higher pitch as jake ran a bit faster, as the display indicated a speed of 7.6 MPH and a distance covered of 9.4 miles.

"Hey, I'm not feeling tired or anything." Jake grinned. "Let's crank it up!"

The treadmill went into higher gear as Jake went even faster. The display indicated 11.9 MPH and distance covered of 19.87 miles.

Within a few minutes, the speed surged to 25.65 MPH and then to 39.77 MPH until it hit 56.44 MPH and distance covered of 176.65 miles!!

"Vroom! I'm like a race car!!! Vroom!!!!" Jake grinned, as he pushed on, going faster and faster, not realizing that he was pushing the treadmill beyond what the machine was made for!

He was passing 64.73 MPH... when all of the sudden the belt under his soccer shoes snapped!

SNNNAAAPPPPPPP!!!!!!

"Whaaa!!!!" Jake shouted, as he leaped off the treadmill, since the belt flew off, exposing the engine underneath, which was on fire!

"Oh no! Fire!" Jake gasped, as he landed on his feet next to the broken treadmill!

Jake took a deep and BLEW on the treadmill with all his might!

SSSSSSHHHHHWWWWWOOOOOOOOSSSSSHHHHHHHH!!!!!!

A mighty hurricane-force gust of wind blew across the room, knocking over ALL the machines in the room, thanks to Jake's super-breath! The fire from the treadmill was put out, but the treadmill was also blown 10 yards across the room, until it slammed against the concrete wall!

Several of the workers came running towards Jake, just to see if he was alright. One of the workers checked the machine. Just then, Sam came upstairs, to see what was going on.

"What happened?" Sam asked his brother.

"I was running on the treadmill but the belt broke and it caught on fire!" Jake explained.

One of the workers came up to Jake, after he read the reading on the display of Jake's treadmill.

"Excuse me... You were running at SIXTY-FOUR miles-per-hour?" the man asked him.

"Yeah... So?" Jake shrugged.

"NOBODY can run THAT FAST!" the guy replied.

"Come on..." Sam said angrily. "The treadmill was broken! Let's go, Jake!"

The man stood there and looked at Jake slack-jawed.

"Your little brother isn't human!!!"

"Yes he is! Your treadmill is BROKEN!" Sam shouted back. "Come, Jake... We're going home!"

"I... I'm sorry I broke the treadmill..." Jake said sadly, as he and Sam got in the car to drive home...

“That’s strange…” Giovanni whispered to himself. “I look… different… Like I’ve gotten a little… bigger?”

The following morning, Giovanni work up feeling very awake, rested and energized. Normally, he usually feels sleepy and groggy in the morning, but this morning, he felt great! He was wide awake, he felt full of energy and he felt strong!

He bolted out of bed and rushed into the bathroom to brush his teeth and take a shower. Then he collected his clothes to wear at school and got dressed. He then came down into the kitchen where he enjoyed his breakfast and prepared his backpack with all the necessary books for the classes of that day before saying goodbye to his mother. Finally, he ran out the door and waited at the bust stop for the bust to take him to the elementary school.

When he arrived at school, he had to carefully walk into the schoolyard because there were a long line of cars waiting to get into the parking lot of parents waiting to drop off their kids. Giovanni was waiting to cross the street, so he could walk into the playground. One car finally stopped, letting him cross. Somehow, the older gentleman at the wheel started talking to the lady sitting next to him, and his foot slipped off the brake. The car slowly rolled forward, just as Giovanni was walking into the street.

Suddenly, there was a loud crash! The front bumper of the old car had smashed into Giovanni’s shoulder!

“Hey! What’s going on?” Giovanni wondered. He looked over and he suddenly saw a car running right into his shoulder. “Back off!”

Giovanni then extended his arms and pushed back on the car, suddenly pushing the car away from him with an amazing show of strength! This was when the driver suddenly realized he had hit the boy who was busy crossing the street!

“Oh no! I’m so terribly sorry!” the man said, as he got out of the car and walked up to Giovanni. “Are you hurt?”

Several other parents also saw what had happened, and they rushed over to Giovanni to see if he was hurt. Strangely enough, Giovanni didn’t feel anything at all. He didn’t even have a scratch on him! Not only that, but he had pushed the large Lincoln Towncar back almost three feet, using an amazing amount of physical strength, which had just left everyone completely astounded!

When the parents and the teachers surrounded Giovanni and the driver of the car, they noticed that the bumper of the car contained a large dent in the front. Clearly, the car had run into Giovanni, who would have been run over by the old man!

“Are you alright?” The teachers asked Giovanni. “My goodness! You just got hit by a car! Are you hurt?”

“No! No! I didn’t feel a thing! Trust me!” the boy replied.

One of the teachers immediately took Giovanni to the nurse’s office, where he was given a thorough checkup. There, the nurse found that there was indeed nothing wrong with him, and that he got away from the car accident without a scratch, which was a miracle! The nurse did call Giovanni’s mother, who came to the school right away. But, since nothing was really wrong with him, they decided to keep him in school for the rest of the day. The other students, who had witnessed the accident, however, were very amazed by the fact that Giovanni was able to remain standing and he was able to push the car back using his bare hands! How did he get so strong? And how did the dent get in the bumper of the car?

During lunch, several boys joined Giovanni and started asking him all kinds of questions. Once more, Giovanni had no idea what had happened, since he was looking the other way and he didn’t even feel that he got hit by the car.

After school was over, Giovanni was called in to the nurse’s office again. Unfortunately, because he stayed late in school, he ended up missing the bus ride home. So, once the nurse was finished checking him out, he left the school building and walked outside only to find that he had just missed the last bus going home. When he tried calling Marco to get a ride home, he realized that his cell phone battery had died as well. There was nothing else left for him to do now but to walk home.

He started walking down the street and realized that he still had about four blocks to go. As he looked up towards the sky, he spotted a few birds flying overhead.

“Man, it must be so nice to be able to fly like a bird!” he grinned, as he decided to hop to his next step. He hopped again and then he began to hover above the ground!

“Hey! What the heck is going on!” he gasped, as he realized that he was able to keep himself floating in the air, using his mind. When he willed his body to descend back until his feet touched down on the sidewalk, he landed back on the floor.

“How… How the heck did I do that?” he gasped, as he realized that he was actually flying.

For a brief moment Giovanni was scared stiff. He had felt like the wind was carrying his body through the air, but then he realized that he was able to change his altitude just by thinking of how high up he wanted to be.

“Oh boy… Don’t tell me I can fly!” he thought to himself, as he slowly allowed his body to rise up into the air until he was hovering three feet above the ground.

Giovanni then extended his arms above his head and directed his body to fly across the sky in a horizontal position. He flew all the way home, landing in the front yard of the house!

“That was so cool! I can fly!” he cheered, as he ran back inside.

121111212.content:
Giovanni trudged his way to the locker room after practice, leaving divets in the grass as he kicked at the lawn in frustration.

He couldn't understand it! The last couple days, practice had gone majorly awesome for him and the rest of his teammates! They had had so much focus and drive and energy, and with their super-powers on top of everything, they all just KNEW they were going to beat the competition out of the water at their next game in a couple days. However, today, Giovanni had been the only one so OFF his game, he had no idea what was going on with his body or his powers, least of all why!

His coordination seemed off somehow. He kept making mistakes. His aim was atrocious. The control he had to exert on his strength to keep from sending the soccer ball into the next county was virtually non-existent. The coach had called him aside three times to correct him and ask if anything was wrong. As far as Giovanni could tell, he still felt more than fine, but for some reason, nothing he did was working. Eventually, the coach had him sit on the sidelines the rest of practice, watching the rest of his teammates perform everything flawlessly.

Giovanni felt ashamed. He had sat there on the bench watching his friends, his face red with embarrassment, until he couldn't stand it anymore and looked at the ground, his feet, anywhere else. He had let the guys down. He'd let the coach down. Worse, he'd let himself down, and he didn't even know WHY!

When he reached the locker room, he quickly stripped off his uniform, tossed it near the dirty clothes basket (but missed, and sent the entire wheeled hamper careening down the hallway to the opposite end, near the girls' locker room!), had a quick shower, re-dressed, gathered his backpack, and left without answering or talking to anybody.

He had a moody, depressed air about him as walked down the sidewalk, heading off the school grounds.

"Hey, Giovanni! Wait up!"

Giovanni stopped and turned and saw Chrys waving an arm at him and running up to him. Giovanni sighed. He had forgotten he had promised to walk home with Chrys again today after practice. She had decided to join the botany club, which met after school the same time as soccer practice, and since they got out at the same time and lived so close to each other, they had figured they might as well walk home together again. Personally, Chrys was helping to ensure she wouldn't get singled out or picked on again during her walk home. Giovanni, meanwhile, was hoping to enjoy some time with someone who enjoyed his company...and knew his secret. However, Giovanni wasn't sure he felt like having company on his walk home today, given the disaster that practice had been for him.

"Hi, Chrys," he said rather morosely, when Chrys caught up to him.

Chrys frowned. "Are you okay? You look depressed."

Giovanni sighed again. Did he really want to spill his guts to a girl he still barely knew? However, his mouth seemed to decide for him and said, "Practice didn't go so well for me today."

"Really? What happened?" Chrys looked at him, concerned. The look on her face reminded Giovanni of how his mom would look when he had a scraped knee or a really bad cough. Chrys already knew his secret. Maybe she could help him figure out why he completely sucked at soccer today.

"Well, I don't really know. Here I am with all these great powers, and today, I felt completely off my game." Giovanni explained the many things that went wrong at practice, and his face went red when he confessed to having been benched.

"Hmmm. Interesting," Chrys said, as a frowned creased her brow, and she rubbed her lips with her finger. She tilted her head, looking at him curiously for moment. Giovanni fidgeted before asking, "What's interesting?"

"G, how did you feel after we left each other yesterday?"

"I felt really good, like I was on top of the world."

"And how did you feel this morning when you got up?"

"Well,.... I felt groggy, like I hadn't slept very well."

"How long did you feel that way?"

Giovanni thought for a moment. "I actually felt kind of out of it until I met up with you at lunch today."

Chrys's lips twitched as if she were going to smile, but her lips evened out into a straight line again. "And you touched my hand at lunch, right?"

Giovanni felt his face and neck get hot. "I was only guiding you to a free table!" He felt he had to defend himself for some reason.

"Yes, yes, I know," Chrys said dismissively with a wave of her hand, "but after you and I connected and spent some time together, did you feel better? More like your usual self?"

Giovanni's eyes widened. "Yes! I did!" He frowned a moment. "But what does all this have to do with practice going so awful for me?"

"Answer me one more question first: How do you feel now?"

Giovanni bit his lip and closed his eyes. He was quiet for a couple moments before opening them and looking into Chrys's bright blue eyes in confusion. "I...I feel...off. Like...there's something missing."

"I think I know," she said softly. Chrys then carefully took Giovanni's hand in her hers. They both gasped as a spark of sensation ran between them. Giovanni realized now that he had felt the same spark at lunch earlier today, when he had touched Chrys's hand to get her attention.

Immediately, Giovanni felt a sense of well-being fill his entire body: wholeness, peace, strength, control, focus. Everything that seemed to have been lacking in him at practice now didn't seem to be lacking in him at all!

"What...what just happened?" Giovanni asked warily, quickly dropping Chrys's hand and taking a step back from her. "I don't understand!"

Chrys sighed. "You feel okay, back to normal now again, don't you?" she asked knowingly.

Giovanni nodded his head.

"I think something happened when you shared your powers with me yesterday," Chrys explained. "When you did that, it affected how you can use and tap into your powers. I think that when you're apart from me for an extended period of time, you can't ground your powers, you lose control over them. Somehow, I have become a sort of grounding force for your powers."

Giovanni groaned. What Chrys said made perfect sense. He didn't want to believe it, but seeing how he felt ever since yesterday--with and without Chrys--Chrys's solution seemed logical.

"So, what do I do now? I can't touch you all the time! And it's not like we have all the same classes together! What do I do at practice? Oh man!"

"I don't think it's as dire as you're making it out to be, G. After you touch me, I'm sure you're grounded for a while. We just have to determine how long. Plus, there's bound to be another way to ground your powers other than having to touch me. We just have to figure out what it or they are."

"Do you have any suggestions?"

When Chrys first came to Giovanni's school, she took several tests so the principal and teachers could determine her placement in classes. Being as smart as she was, she tested to the highest level in almost all subjects. As a result, one of the few classes that Chrys and Giovanni had together was social studies.

Today, they were having a test on the American Revolutionary War.

Giovanni was hard at work on his answers, chewing on his tongue and beating the eraser of his pencil against the desk, trying to remember the facts he very studiously stuffed into his brain last night. Maybe he should start studying with Chrys from now on--she probably had great techniques for remembering dates and people and places. Right now, he was trying to decide if it was "one if by land, two if by sea" or the other way around.

"Goodness, who wouldn't know the answer to that is George Washington?" suddenly came into Giovanni's mind.

Huh? he thought to himself.

"Hmm...the writer of the Declaration of Independence was--duh!--Thomas Jefferson! Sheesh! How much easier can she make these questions?!"

Wha...? Giovanni looked down his test to the next several questions and saw that number 12 did indeed ask, "Who was the writer of the Declaration of Independence?"

Giovanni looked over at the next chair and saw that Chrys was writing down her answer in her loopy, yet efficient manner--and she was answering question 12!

"Alright, number 13...," Giovanni heard as clear as bell in his mind, even though he was sure that Chrys said nothing out loud.

Apparently, he was hearing Chrys's thoughts through their telepathy link--and she didn't even realize it!

Now Giovanni was in a quandry: should he be honest and tell Chrys he could hear her thoughts, including her answers to the test,...or should he keep quiet and try to block her out, which probably really wouldn't work since he didn't know how, and continue to hear her answers, which he knew would guarantee him an "A" on the test?

Giovanni sighed. He knew he had to do the right thing.

"Uh, Chrys?" he thought.

"Hmm? Oh, gee, as if we didn't cover the answer to this question very extensively in class! Besides, how many of us haven't seen "The Patriot" and know that the commander of the British forces in South Carolina was General Cornwallis?!"

"HEY, CHRYS!" he thought really loudly. "I can hear everything you're thinking! You're practically giving me all the answers to the test!"

Chrys suddenly looked up. Her eyes widened as they looked straight into Giovanni's.

"Are...are you serious?" she thought, biting her lower lip.

"Yeah," he thought back sheepishly. "Sorry!"

Chrys gave an audible sigh. "No, I'm the one who's sorry, G," she thought. "I'll try harder to not...project my thoughts out to you. I guess I just got so excited over how easy this test was that my thoughts got out of hand. Hey!" she said suddenly, frowning at him. "You're not cheating off of me, are you?"

Giovanni's face reddened. "No! Er...well...I'm not trying to, but you did give me a couple answers before I figured out what was going on."

Chrys sighed again and shook her head. "No more cheating, soccer boy. We only have ten more minutes to finish this test. We better get writing."

"Right, yeah."

The rest of the test passed in silence, other than the scratching of pencils on paper. Giovanni did hear the occasional sigh or grumble from Chrys in his mind, but he didn't hear anymore explicit answers to the test. Giovanni managed to finish the test before the teacher called for pencils down. Of course, Chrys had finished long before and had quadruple-checked all her answers.

When the bell rang for lunch, Giovanni walked with Chrys to the cafeteria. Chrys was holding her books close to her chest with her head down.

"Chrys?" Giovanni asked uncertainly. "Are you okay?" Then, Giovanni noticed her face was red. "Are you embarrassed?"

Chrys looked away and said quietly, "Yes, okay? I can't believe I gave you the answers to the test...just by thinking them loudly!"

"Hey, it's okay! I knew the answers to those questions anyway. And it's not like you were trying to give me the answers!"

Chrys sighed and then turned her head back to look at Giovanni. He smiled at her and put a friendly hand on her shoulder. Chrys gave a small smile back. "Thanks for cheering me up, G. You're...you're a good friend."

Giovanni shrugged his own shoulders in embarrassment.

They found a table with some of Giovanni's soccer buddies and sat down to eat their home-brought lunches. Giovanni pulled out two ham and cheese sandwiches, a bag of chips, an apple, a package of Twinkies, and a juice box. Chrys, on the other hand, brought out several tupperware containers. The first was full of veggies--carrots, celery, slices of green pepper and cucumber, and broccoli and cauliflower sprigs. Another container was full of some tan-colored lumpy stuff that sort of looked like oatmeal, but didn't smell like oatmeal. She also had several slices of fresh bread, numerous slices of fresh fruit, and a thermos.

Morgan looked on in wonder as Chrys started in on her meal, dunking her veggies in the brown stuff and taking delicate bites. "What are you eating?" he asked.

"Oh! This is just some hummus I use to dip my veggies in. Tastes really good! Made of chickpeas, also known as garbanzo beans, lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, and tahini, which is ground sesame seed paste. You want to try some?"

All the boys looked at each other with weird looks on their faces. Giovanni didn't want his friend's feelings hurt, so he bravely said, "I'll try some."

"Here you go!" Chrys held out her tupperware of veggies, out of which Giovanni picked a baby carrot, then her tupperware of hummus, and Giovanni dipped his carrot in the tan stuff. He bit off the carrot, chewed, and swallowed. All the soccer guys looked at him expectantly.

"It's not bad," Giovanni said. "Come on, guys, try some."

All the guys then willingly took a veggie, dipped it in the hummus, and ate. They were all pleasantly surprised at how good it tasted.

"Thanks, G," Chrys said softly, giving him a small smile before taking a drink from her thermos.

"Sure, Chrys. What are you drinking?"

"Soy milk."

Giovanni couldn't help a grimace. "Are you allergic to regular milk, or something?"

Chrys shrugged and took a bite of orange. "Don't know. I've never had it. My parents are vegan vegetarians, and so my sisters and I eat the same as they do."

"What's vegan vegetarian?"

"Well, you know what vegetarian is, right?" Giovanni nodded. "Well, besides not eating meat, vegan vegetarians also don't eat dairy or eggs, or anything that's derived from animals. My family even goes so far as to not wear any clothes made from animals or use products that were tested on animals."

"Wow. That sounds...um...strict."

Chrys shrugged again and took a bite of bread. "I'm used to it."

They all ate in silence for a bit until Morgan decided to tell a joke. He began to really get into his telling and moved his arms around excitedly. Without realizing it, he flung his arm out and sent his box of milk flying across the table--straight for Chrys! Chrys saw it coming straight for her and instinctively crossed her arms over her face. She waited a few seconds, but never felt anything hit her. Slowly, she lowered her arms and was surprised to see the milkbox and its spewed contents of milk suspended in the air, frozen in time! Everyone else at the table, including Giovanni, were looking at the frozen box and milk with wide eyes, in surprise and wonder.

"How...!"
"What...!"
"Whoa!"
"Dude!"

Giovanni looked at Chrys, and Chrys looked back. "Did I...just do that?!" Chrys thought to Giovanni. "Did I just use one of your powers?!"

Giovanni shook his head and looked back at the suspended milk droplets. "If you did," he thought back to her, "it's a power I never realized before!"

Update Feb. 19, 2011: Dedicated to Giovanni Jana and the Phantoms of Levy Park co-ed under 10-years-old soccer team from Tallahassee, Florida USA, who finished their season UNDEFEATED. These kids play like they REALLY have super powers...

Inspired by Giovanni Jana, a 10-year-old soccer player on the Levy Phantoms soccer team in Tallahassee, Florida. Giovanni plays like he really has super powers...

This story is about a group of boys who have known each other for a long time. They are all friends and they get along with one another very well. One afternoon, after soccer practice at an open field located at a public park, an alien being in an UFO circles the soccer field and grants these eleven boys unbelievable super powers.

These boys gain unlimited strength and fantastic speed, making them unbeatable on the soccer field. But, what happens, when their friends, their siblings, their parents and their classmates in school begin to discover that these boys have gained amazing abilities? How do these boys cope? How long can they hide their powers?

The boys gain powers such as;
-super strength
-super speed
-invulnerability
-ability to fly
-x-ray vision
-heat vision
-super-vision
-super hearing
-mind reading
-teleportation

The boys have fun discovering their powers and they try to hide them at first.

The boys are NOT evil and are NOT out to rule the world or destroy cities or kill people, etc.

How do their parents, older siblings (eg. older brothers!), and classmates deal with them when they suddenly discover that they have AWESOME SUPER POWERS like Superman?

Please, no death, no extreme violence, no sex and no vore. No bad language and the like. No one-line or one-paragraph chapters. These will all be deleted.

***500 Gift Points for GOOD chapters of over 500 words in length which follow all the rules and contain acceptable grammar and spelling.

***EXTRA GP's added for scenes where one or more boys use their powers in your new chapter in a fun, entertaining or heroic way.
